General.Name: Sunflex Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunflex Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of flexible printed circuit boards (FPCB) in Taiwan. The company provides rigid flex, multi-layer, double side, single side double access, and single side FPCBs. Its products are used in touch panels, liquid crystal modules, computer accessories, light bars, and automotive electronics. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.522, Nanshang Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333014
